}} 'VS.' is a game show that ran in 1999 on Comedy Central. It was hosted by
Greg Proops, with Joe Liss as announcer.

The game featured two three-member teams that were complete opposites
(firemen/pyromaniacs). Proops would ask both teams questions about general
topics as well as topics relating to the subject that divided the teams.
